flawed_nl_solution:
Max can deliver a maximum of 35 * 7 = <<35*7=245>>245 packages in one week.
For 2 days Max has carried the maximum number of packages, which in total means 2 * 35 = <<2*35=70>>70 packages.
One day Max has carried only 1/7 * 35 = <<1/7*35=5>>5 packages.
On two other days, Max delivered only 4/5 * 35 = <<4/5*35=175/4>>175/4 packages.
That means, Max could deliver 245 - 175/4 - 5 - 70 - 50 = <<245-175/4-5-70-50=305/4>>305/4 more packages.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 175/4. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
